Hello

I love the intersection of design, research, and strategy, and I also love cooking, making music, yoga, reading, and cinema.

I enjoy meeting new people. If you have something to share, you‚Äôd like to play or learn together, or can think of any othe reason we should be talking, get in touch with me. This is my hello page, where you can learn how I like to keep in touch.

How to contact me:

  • Some of your answers might be found on my faq page.
  • For any inquiry, email is your best shot. Please use my contact form.
  • I infrequently check Mastodon because I like things that are decentralized.
  • If you‚Äôd like to schedule mentor time with me, check my mentoring page (I‚Äôm currently on hiatus from it)
  • I do not use social media. Any account in my name that you may find is not in use, so feel safe assuming I won‚Äôt see your message, and I won‚Äôt receive a notification of it.

Zinzy Waleson Geene (she/ they) is a researcher, designer, and queer facilitator from Amsterdam. She's interested in humanities and behavioral sciences, yoga practice, and amateur cooking. She engages in mellow cultural and critical analysis, linking and tinkering on her personal website, zinzy.website .
